summary: My personal texture pack that I made when I reached 247 subs. It only has a few changes and keeps the vanilla style.
title: Pack86 (or Cornetpack)

summary: A skin pack which turns my Discord server’s members into the cardboard-version of their skin!
title: XXL Stan skin pack

summary: My Minecraft skins, for both Bedrock and Java.
title: My skins

summary: UloriumGames is a Minecraft Bedrock minigames realm.
title: What is Ulorium Games?

summary: Help clean the ocean by collecting trash in Trash Collectors! A fun map to compete with friends and support MrBeast’s and Mark Rober’s #TeamSeas campaign! Collect trash, feed turtles and buy various powerups joined with MrBeast’s outro song music in noteblocks!
title: Trash Collectors! #TeamSeas

summary: This script lets you calculate how many blocks you place every second! You can customise the time between every update: 1, 3, 5, 30 or 60 seconds! Singleplayer and Windows 10 only.
title: Blocks Per Second Calculator

summary: Minecraft, but Speed and Jump progressively increase: the more you walk and jump, the faster you move and the higher you jump. This addon is very challenging, and with enough walking as well as jumping, you might reach the maximum levels!
title: Minecraft, but Speed and Jump Progressively Increase

summary: Minecraft Mansave: a kamikaze and lifeguards. If the kamikaze dies, he WON! If he’s still alive after (by default in my addon) 2 minutes, he lost! This idea was originally invented by McBirken and I ported it to Bedrock as an addon!
title: Minecraft Mansave

summary: Every minute, gravity flips for 30 seconds! You will get levitated in the air! The goal of this challenge is to beat Minecraft (kill the Ender dragon). Play with your friends or alone!
title: Minecraft, But Gravity Flips Every Minute

summary: Eating Time! is an addon that adds decorating entities like a waterjug, salt shaker, plate, mug, etc. It also adds some items like a fork, spoon, ladle and kitchen knife.
title: Eating Time!

summary: Dream’s Ultimate Tag is a function pack of the minigame Minecraft Ultimate Tag by Dream. A random hunter is chosen and has to tag a runner. If the runner(s) survive for 2 minutes, they win! If they don’t… they lose.
title: Dream's Minecraft Ultimate Tag

summary: French Slap is a game like Cookie Slap; the goal is to knock all the players off the arena, last player alive wins, but this map is in a typically-French theme!
title: French Slap

summary: No More Scary Cave Sounds is a resource pack that will change the cave sounds (yes, they got added in 1.16!) ambient.cave to ambient sounds like water lowing in a cave or birds singing.
title: No More Scary Cave Sounds

summary: Just a little, simple Spleef game. Spleef is a game where you need to break the block under the other players to make them fall into the void and die. This map contains 2 different arenas and 2 gamemodes. 1 arena has 3 layers and the other 2 layers!
title: A Little Simple Spleef Game

summary: Welcome to Death Swap, a mini-game of trapping your friend! When the game starts, you have 8 minutes to gather resources. Then the swapping will begin! You and your friend will swap places! The goal is to kill your opponent!
title: Death Swap (2 Players Only)
